nodes.text: The CS14 "Ghost" light blaster pistol was a powerful yet easy-to-conceal light blaster pistol manufactured by BlasTech Industries.
Small, lightweight, and easily concealed, the CS14 was one of the smallest full-fledged blaster pistols on the market, and was considered a premier personal defense blaster.

Roughly the size and weight of a standard holdout-blaster, the CS14 was built using lightweight polycarbonates and sensor-proof alloys, making the weapon virtually invisible to most weapon scanners. As such, on an individual with the right holster and clothing, it was very difficult to detect without an extremely thorough search.

Marketed primarily to detectives and investigators, the CS14 was adopted by state intelligence agencies across the galaxy as a standard-issue weapon for field agents due to the weapon's size, power, and ease of concealment.
